alert.note: Alert for Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Washington County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 3:58PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Arapahoe, southwestern Washington and southeastern Adams Counties through 430 PM MDT... At 358 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles east of Cottonwood Valley, or 26 miles north of Limon, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Woodlin School and Last Chance. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Washington County
